user.description: If you leave the host empty, discovery will be used to find devices.

discovery_confirm.description: Do you want to set up {model} ({host})?

set_color_scene.name: Set color scene
set_color_scene.description: Changes the light to the specified RGB color and brightness. If the light is off, it will be turned on.

rgb_color.name: RGB color
rgb_color.description: Color for the light in RGB-format.

set_hsv_scene.name: Set HSV scene
set_hsv_scene.description: Changes the light to the specified HSV color and brightness. If the light is off, it will be turned on.

hs_color.name: Hue/sat color
hs_color.description: Color for the light in hue/sat format. Hue is 0-359 and Sat is 0-100.

set_color_temp_scene.name: Set color temperature scene
set_color_temp_scene.description: Changes the light to the specified color temperature. If the light is off, it will be turned on.

kelvin.name: Kelvin
kelvin.description: Color temperature for the light in Kelvin.

set_color_flow_scene.name: Set color flow scene
set_color_flow_scene.description: Starts a color flow. If the light is off, it will be turned on.

count.name: Count
count.description: The number of times to run this flow (0 to run forever).

action.name: Action
action.description: The action to take after the flow stops.

transitions.name: Transitions
transitions.description: Array of transitions, for desired effect. Examples https://yeelight.readthedocs.io/en/stable/flow.html.

set_auto_delay_off_scene.name: Set auto delay off scene
set_auto_delay_off_scene.description: Turns the light on to the specified brightness and sets a timer to turn it back off after the given number of minutes. If the light is off, Set a color scene, if light is off, it will be turned on.

minutes.name: Minutes
minutes.description: The time to wait before automatically turning the light off.

start_flow.name: Start flow
start_flow.description: Start a custom flow, using transitions from https://yeelight.readthedocs.io/en/stable/yeelight.html#flow-objects.

music_mode.name: Music mode
music_mode.description: Use true or false to enable / disable music_mode.
